SELECT
j.recommand1
+ j.recommand2
+ j.recommand3
+ j.recommand4
+ j.recommand5
as recommad,
j.The_price as theprice , j.arrive_time as arriveTime, j.departure_time as departureTime, j.vehicle_name as vehicleName , j.journey_name as journeyName , j.departure_station_name as departureStationName, t1.location_lat as departureStationNameLocationLat, t1.location_lng as departureStationNameLocationLng, j.arrive_station_name as arriveStationName, t2.location_lat as arriveStationNameLocationLat, t2.location_lng as arriveStationNameLocationLng from journeys_dealed j LEFT JOIN train_station t1 ON j.departure_station_name = t1.`name` LEFT JOIN train_station t2 ON j.arrive_station_name = t2.`name`
and j.journey_name = #{StartAndEndCity}
and j.departure_station_name = #{StartTrainstation}
and j.arrive_station_name = #{EndTrainstation}
ORDER BY recommad DESC
